set(EXTERNAL_INCLUDE_DIRS
        .
)

set(EXTERNAL_HEADERS
        printf/printf.h
        riscv-opcodes/encoding.h
)

set(EXTERNAL_SOURCES
#        printf/printf.c
)

# Make paths absolute
list(TRANSFORM EXTERNAL_INCLUDE_DIRS PREPEND "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/")
list(TRANSFORM EXTERNAL_HEADERS PREPEND "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/")
list(TRANSFORM EXTERNAL_SOURCES PREPEND "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/")
list(APPEND EXTERNAL_SOURCES ${EXTERNAL_HEADERS})

# Export to the parent scope
set(EXTERNAL_INCLUDE_DIRS ${EXTERNAL_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(EXTERNAL_HEADERS ${EXTERNAL_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(EXTERNAL_SOURCES ${EXTERNAL_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
